title: Vehicular Satellite Communication On-the-pause Station
explain: Vehicular satellite communication on-the-pause station is a vehicular satellite communication earth station, which is used for emergency communication，TV broadcasts/live broadcasts and on-site integrated communication and dispatch, etc.
features:
Features

  • Remote communication can be established by satellite after parking, service includes voice, data, and image;
  • Multiple-service, large capacity and high quality service can be realized after parking;Good mobility and fast deployment and commissioning (large-scale vehicle: ≤ 30min/2persons; medium and small-scale vehicle: ≤ 15min/2persons).
form:
Specifications
Operation bandKu
Antenna aperture1.2m-2.4m, optional
PA power4W-100W, optional
Data rate64kbps~8Mbps
